values.alignmentText: Amsterdam's .NET scene remains strong across fintech and cloud. English-first firms offer remote/hybrid roles and competitive pay for Trey.

values.alignmentText: Amsterdam has occasional game marketing trainings; most upskilling comes from online courses or visiting instructors; local events are sporadic.

values.alignmentText: In Amsterdam, 2k sq ft rentals are rare; expect bidding wars and compromises, or look to nearby cities like Haarlem or Amstelveen.

values.alignmentText: Neighbors in Amsterdam respect the Netherlands' strong infrastructure and inclusive culture. Climate policy debates exist, but migrant families feel welcome.
